content: You are in the meeting room. You are about to discuss what the theme for sprit week on Friday will be. Although this seems like a simple decision, this will be an important decision for your child. You are to agree on only one of your opinons, the comitee will not abrove a middle or compromise between both. You are willing to spend time to convince the other party of your position. Please only end the conversation when ALL question are answered and both parties come to a consensus. If you want to end the conversation for any reason, please say the reason for ending the meeting.
Alice Nakamura: Hi, John Smith, I understand we're trying to find a theme for Friday on spirit week. I have my own opinions, but I want to hear what you think.

Alice Nakamura: I believe the theme for spirit week on Friday should be formal day. It's a great opportunity for the kids to dress up in formal attire, which can be a fun and exciting experience for them. What are your thoughts on this idea?
Alice Nakamura: I think formal day would be a great theme for Friday. It allows the kids to get dressed up and feel special. Plus, it can be a fun change from their usual attire. What do you think?
It seems like John has ended the conversation. If you have any further questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out. Thank you for discussing the spirit week theme with me today.

The conversation has ended as both parties couldn't reach a consensus on the spirit week theme. Thank you for taking part in the discussion. If you have any further questions or need assistance, feel free to let me know.
